name: Sussex 75
preparation:
Give the French 75 a British makeover by replacing Champagne with Ridgeview English sparkling wine. It’s an improvement, considering that the Sussex-based winery was named 2018 Winemaker of the Year at the International Wine & Spirit Competition. Keep it British all the way through by using exceptionally smooth Hendrick’s gin. It’s the perfect time to enjoy the Sussex 75, considering the Duchess of Sussex just gave birth. Make one today and toast the new royal baby, Archie Harrison Mountbatten-Windsor.

Add the gin and lemon juice into a flute.

Top with sparkling wine.

Garnish with a lemon twist.
